Testing VPSUBSW instruction
==========================
Test 1: 128-bit basic functionality
Input: 30000 -30000 15000 -15000 32767 -32768 0 1 
Subtrahend: 10000 -10000 20000 -20000 1 1 1 -1 
Result: 20000 -20000 -5000 5000 32766 -32768 -1 2 
Expected: 20000 -20000 -5000 5000 32766 -32768 -1 2 
[PASS]

Test 2: 128-bit memory operand
Input: 32767 -32768 0 1 -1 32767 -32768 16384 
Subtrahend (mem): 1 1 1 -1 -1 -1 -1 16384 
Result: 32766 -32768 -1 2 0 32767 -32767 0 
Expected: 32766 -32768 -1 2 0 32767 -32767 0 
[PASS]

Test 3: 256-bit AVX operation
Input: 30000 -30000 15000 -15000 32767 -32768 0 1 30000 -30000 15000 -15000 32767 -32768 0 1 
Subtrahend: 10000 -10000 20000 -20000 1 1 1 -1 10000 -10000 20000 -20000 1 1 1 -1 
Result: 20000 -20000 -5000 5000 32766 -32768 -1 2 20000 -20000 -5000 5000 32766 -32768 -1 2 
Expected: 20000 -20000 -5000 5000 32766 -32768 -1 2 20000 -20000 -5000 5000 32766 -32768 -1 2 
[PASS]

VPSUBSW tests PASSED
